entities.name: gringotts
entities.description: Gringotts is mentioned as the location where Harry's wand was made.

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is a goblin who whispers to Harry and helps him cast the Imperious Curse.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who casts the Imperious Curse on Travers.

entities.name: imperio
entities.description: The Imperio spell is cast by Harry to control Travers.

entities.name: travers
entities.description: Travers is a character who is controlled by the Imperious Curse cast by Harry.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix's wand is examined by Griphook and Travers.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione denies that the new wand belongs to her.

relationships.description: Harry casts the Imperious Curse on Travers.
Harry controls Travers using the Imperious Curse.
Griphook is associated with Gringotts, where Harry's wand was made.
